name: Sly 3: Honor Among Thieves
synopsis: In Sly 3: Honor Among Thieves, you follow Sly Cooper and his partners in crime as they plunder locations around the world and fight adversaries, both old and new. Sly 3 is a cell-shaded platform game involving vehicles, gadgets, and an assortment of minigames. Joining your heists are a few new playable characters and enough new items to keep them fully equipped. Sly 3 also includes competitive and cooperative multiplayer modes.
